Toggle Menu

salt.modules.logadm

Module for managing Solaris logadm based log rotations.

remove

Syntax

salt.modules.logadm.remove(
								name,
								conf_file='/etc/logadm.conf'
								)

Details

Remove log pattern from logadm

CLI Example:

salt '*' logadm.remove myapplog

rotate

Syntax

salt.modules.logadm.rotate(
								name,
								pattern=False,
								count=False,
								age=False,
								size=False,
								copy=True,
								conf_file='/etc/logadm.conf'
								)

Details

Set up pattern for logging.

CLI Example:

salt '*' logadm.rotate myapplog pattern='/var/log/myapp/*.log' count=7

show_conf

Syntax

salt.modules.logadm.show_conf(
								conf_file='/etc/logadm.conf'
								)

Details

Show parsed configuration

CLI Example:

salt '*' logadm.show_conf
